file_content.text: These stressful times = overload Mateyvee's circuits
You = hurry to Carrick Station + contact Master Satele Shan // Vital mission = depends on you
Mateyvee = begs pardon + requests input // You = skilled combatant + accustomed to physical violence?
I've been in a lot of fights, and I'm still alive. Does that answer your question?
I have combat experience.
Answer = acceptable // You = please stand by
I don't get asked that every day. What's your business, droid?
Why do you ask?
Mateyvee = allows employer to explain // You = stand by
If you need a sparring partner, set your sights a little lower. I could take you apart in a microsecond.
You don't want to fight me.
Response = wonderful news // Your talents = desperately needed // You = stand by
This is Master Satele Shan of the Jedi Order. The Republic requires its most combat-ready agents for a secret mission into Colicoid space.
Our survival against the Sith Empire depends on champions willing to risk their lives. If you wish to volunteer, my droid has further instructions.
You = interested in opportunity to save Republic from certain doom?
I always am.
Yes, but what a way to ask me.
Response = splendid // Mateyvee = hopes you survive the mission
Not if it means dying.
Mateyvee = not best spokesdroid // You = speak with Master Satele Shan about mission
You = please proceed to Carrick Station + contact Master Satele // She = explains everything
You = mark Mateyvee's words // Galaxy = plunging into chaos
